text: @dbongino @TheJusticeDept needs 2 weigh in on asking 318,171,000 Americans 2 continue sheltering in place for the 8,829,000 with Comorbidities who "may" die from #COVID19 while the economy tanks, unemployment soars and Americans become dependent on the Fed Govt for handouts! ENOUGH @POTUS
